body.name: KRIB BLING 17.7 lbs Full Automatic Washing Machine with LED Display Compact Washing Machine with Drain Dump, 10 Wash Programs and 8 Water Levels Ideal for Dorms, Apartments, RV, Grey
features: 👔【Full Automatic Washing Machine】 Free you from manual washing with our full automatic washing machines. You just need to set up the washing/spinning program and it works on its own. Washing machines have drain pipes that allow you to drain dirty water easily, making our lives simpler.

👕【Large Wash Capacity&Compact Design】This full automatic washing machine is equipped with a stainless steel honeycomb-shaped inner tub, which can load 17.7 pounds at a time, and can wash many different types of clothes for you, completely freeing your hands. Suitable for dorms, apartment.

👖【Multifunctional Control Panel 】This portable washer has 10 programs and 8 water levels with clear instructions for all functions and operations. You can easily choose the appropriate program and water level to meet your needs. Just load your dirty laundry, add water, choose a washing program, and start washing in no time!

👗【Compact Design】This portable washing machine is lightweight and compact, which can be easily moved and save space. easy to operate. the transparent washing machine cover allows you to check the washing progress of your clothes at any time while washing. Great for homes, dorms, apartments, RVs, and camping.

👚Service Hotline】Provide one-year warranty service. If you have any questions about this product, you can contact us through the after-sales email, we will provide you with the most friendly and sincere help. Thank you for your trust and choice of our products!

Why does the washing machine leak when received? After the production of the factory, there will be a washing machine drainage test, which may be the water left in the pipe. It is not a quality problem and can be used normally. Do i need to leave my tap running the entire time it is going through a cycle? Or long enough for it to fill. You should leave the tap running/open because the washing machine has a valve in it that automatically turns the water on and off as needed. Does this compact Washer need to be level with the faucet or can i keep it on the floor? It can be at floor level. All connecting tubes and hoses allow for that scenario. Does this mini washing machine come with wheels? No doesn't come with wheels but you can buy a platform on Amazon to sit it on with wheels Does this portable washer hook up to my kitchen sink? Yes, of course, as long as the washing machine is placed not far away and the hose is long enough to connect to the kitchen sink.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars READ BEFORE BUYING ☺️
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a new washing machine and I am extremely satisfied with my purchase. The washing machine has completely exceeded my expectations in terms of performance, convenience, and durability.First and foremost, the washing machine delivers exceptional cleaning results. It effectively removes tough stains and dirt from my clothes, leaving them fresh and spotless. Additionally, it has various wash cycles and water temperature options, allowing me to customize each load according to my specific needs. This versatility ensures that my clothes are treated gently and efficiently, regardless of the fabric type.The machine's capacity is impressive as well. With its generous drum size, I can easily wash larger loads, saving time and energy. The advanced technology also ensures that the machine operates quietly, minimizing any disturbance in my home.What sets this washing machine apart is its user-friendly interface. The control panel is intuitive and straightforward, making it easy to navigate through different settings and options. The machine also has a clear and bright display, allowing me to monitor the progress of my laundry effortlessly.In terms of durability, this washing machine is built to last. The materials used are of high quality, and the construction is sturdy. I have been using it for several months now, and it has shown no signs of wear or malfunction. This gives me peace of mind, knowing that my investment will continue to serve me well for years to come.Lastly, the customer service provided by the manufacturer has been exceptional. They were prompt in answering my questions and addressing any concerns I had. This level of support has added to my overall satisfaction with the product.In conclusion, I highly recommend this washing machine to anyone in need of a reliable and efficient laundry appliance. Its outstanding performance, user-friendly interface, and durability make it a worthwhile investment. With this machine, doing laundry has become a breeze, and I am confident that it will continue to meet my needs for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little washer!!!
reviews.reviewText: Got this yesterday! Washed 3 loads so far and I am impressed!!! I needed something to use while staying at a resort in Florida as the cost of doing laundry here is like 2$ each wash and 2$ to dry....I have already spent what it cost me to purchase this, that's why I decided to try this. For sure you should not ever overload it. I put in 2 jogger pants, 2 sweaters, 2 panties and 1 pair of socks and there was still room for more. Easy to set up, did it myself within about 30 minutes. Easy to understand and use. I highly recommend!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good washing machine, it is suitable for the separate handling of clothes or underwear for children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. First two uses the inner piece to collect dog hair and whatever else broke and no longer attaches inside machine.After 5 uses I found two screws that fell into the drum during one cycle wash.Now it is leaking from the bottom and I found 2 bolts with washers attached to them that fell off under the machine.I have no idea where they go and no idea why it is leaking underneath it.It is leaking where the main connection is under the washer leading to the rest of the drainage route.But the connection is still secure so no idea why it’s leaking above the connection piece.I don’t wash big loads.Mostly small loads in this needing 3L of water or 6L.My last load I did was 2 new thinner bath towels, 4 kitchen wash clothes and 9 - 11x11 inch rags.Nothing heavy and this was when the washer lost the bolts underneath and started leaking.I bought this because I couldn’t find a used washer I could afford around me.I got it on a sale so paid around $215 for the machine.I haven’t had it long and I don’t use it every day. I planned to use this when I move because even though it washes much Much Smaller loads than a normal washer it has nice selection options for cycles.Cleans clothes very well and due to my health issues I at least still had a way to wash clothes in my home.I’ll be trying to contact customer service with this company to see what options I have.So I’ll edit my review once I get answer from them if I can get ahold of them.This machine is sadly cheaply made and is not worth the listing pricesStuff is glued underneathWires used for the machine are inside a plastic bag and that is wrapped to keep the plastic on.Cheap plastic material used for the drain sections for the water

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best mini washer I have used!!
reviews.reviewText: After using a mini washer where I had to manually switch clothes from one side over the washer into the other side to spin the clothes...... I will NEVER want to use any other mini washer ever again. It's so convenient...small enough to fit into my dining area with my mini dryer. I live in an apt complex, so I use them when its raining, when the laudry rooms are closed, and when i dont have money on my laundry card.
